description.narrative: DRRR / Emergency Response, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid), Evaluation And Research, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Operations Support To Programme Delivery (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Supply And Logistics, Supply And Logistics (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is effectively designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to support the ongoing earthquake and polio outbreak emergency responses and mobilized significant support to planning, operations, service delivery, resource mobilization and coordination. UNICEF played an active role in the cluster system and coordinated activities in the field. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020
